string-array.name: drm_description_list
string-array.item: Encryption algorithm supported by DRM system

Robustness of DRM system
L1: Perform content decryption and processing in TEE
L2: Perform content decryption in TEE, but processing out of it.
L3: Others, not defined as TEE
The security level may be changed by the vendor.
*TEE: Trusted Execution Environment

HDCP support status of transmission path to a device processing content including a cable
0: UNKNOWN
1: HDCP is not supported
2: HDCP Ver 1.0
3: HDCP version 2.0 Type 1
4: HDCP version 2.1 Type 1
5: HDCP version 2.2 Type 1
6: HDCP version 2.3 Type 1
2147483647: No digital output
*HDCP: High bandwidth Digital Content Protection

string-array.name: security_description_list
string-array.item: Whitebox crypto = cryptographic algorithm implemented in software\ntrue: Whitebox based DRM key management.\nfalse:Whitebox crypto does not perform it.
Whitebox crypto = cryptographic algorithm implemented in software\ntrue: Whitebox based DRM key management and content decoding.\nfalse:Whitebox crypto does not perform these operations.
true: Hardware based DRM key management and crypto operation.\nfalse: Hardware does NOT perform these operations.
true: Hardware based DRM key management, crypto operation and content decoding.\nfalse: Hardware does NOT perform these operations.
true: Hardware based DRM key management, crypto operation, content decoding, media handling.\nfalse: Hardware does NOT perform these operations.
